35045.name: The Eastern Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.

35004.name: Before The Battle Gardens
description: You stand in what could be the first lobby, outdoors.  A large
stone circle stands here infront of the large doors of the arena.
Inside, stands the great lobby, and the rest of the arena.  Here, a
large fountain stands, with stone lettering reading [{RW{rorld {wB{Wattle
{BA{brena{x].  To the east and west of you is the road leading to the ticket
gates.

35010.name: The Western Wing [Offices]
description: You stand in the western wing.  Some construction workers scambles
as you walk in, to look busy.  The hall is long, and made from the
same dark grey material in the lobby.  The hall stretches down, filled
with doors on either side, all the way to the end to the north.

35093.name: A alley behind the Battle Gardens
description: You stand in a small alley behind the buildings of Westbridge Ave.
The alley extends south, where you see a large iron gate, and the
great WBA Battle Gardens.  A guard stands here, watching you.

35112.name: Entrance To The Hilp ST. Station
description: A large pair of stone staircases lead down underground to the Train
Station.  You stand on Hilp Street in Torregiano, the party street.
Outside walking by is large groups of people, and the sound of music
and fun echos down the tunnel.  Down is the Train Station, and North
is Hilp Street & The WBA Battle Gardens.

35099.name: Before The Arena's Sports Bar
description: You stand before the Sports Bar of the arena, the main party place
in the whole building.  The room is filled with life and activies,
smoke pours out as everyone enjoys themselves.  Food and drink are on
the tables.  Down the stairs is the lobby of the Arena.
To the west is the "WOMENS BATHROOM".

35033.name: Before The Large Doors
description: Before you stands a pair of huge doors, leading out into the back
lot of the arena.  To the south, an equally huge pair of doors lead
into the arena.  The large room continues east and west, and too the
north a large glowing red sign reads {REXIT{x.

35006.name: The Eastern Ticket Gate
description: You stand at the Eastern Ticket Gate.  Two guards stand on either
side of the iron gate, watching everyone walk in.  Another Guard
stands infront of a box, ripping tickets up.  The Arena stands before
you, waiting for your entrance.

35042.name: The Eastern Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.
{R<--- The Zhentarims{x

35044.name: The Eastern Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.
{R<--- X-Cops{x

35067.name: Church Of Nightmare Locker Room
description: ----------------- Rules & Regulations Of Waterstock -----------------
1. Teams will be made up of 1 member of each class. [14]
2. Outside EQ will be permitted.
3. No Potions or Pills Allowed once the battle has started.
4. There will be NO LOOTING in this arena.
5. Clans who cannot create a whole team, that's your fault.
6. The arena will be logged, cheaters within clans will be disqualf.
7. Being Disqualified means your clan looses, meaning bye bye clan!
8. Corpses will be returned by the Immortal Staff.
9. Three Rounds of Attacks, Once you die, your out until next round.
10. IMP INVIS is illegal when your team is only down to 2 members.
{x
PENALTY: Breakage of the WBA Rules & Regulations will result in your
clan getting destroyed (WIPED), your own characters destroyed (WIPED,
and a full site block on your ISP (Full Ban). The WBA event will be

35005.name: The Eastern Entrance
description: You stand at the Eastern Entrance.  To the west you see the doors
to the grand lobby of the arena, and the line from the eastern gate.
Some security guards walk around here, waiting for problems, or just
to watch the crowd.

35047.name: The Eastern Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.

35021.name: The Western Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.

35114.name: At The Hilp ST. Train Platform
description: You stand on a large underground platform.  To the west a very
large train sits allowing its passangers to step off, before it takes
off into the tunnels that run all under the city of Torregiano.  The
platform is plain, smooth carved rock.  Groups of city folk stand
waiting for the right train to come in.  To the east you see the
station opens up.

description: You stand in the western wing.  Some construction workers scambles

same dark grey material in the lobby.  The hall stretches down, filled

35013.name: The Southwest Corner
description: You stand in the southwest corner of the arena.  To the east is the
Western Wing, which contains many of the offices of the WBA.  To the
north, you see a very long corridor, which hold the locker rooms of
the arena.

35011.name: The Western Wing [Offices]
description: You stand in the western wing.  Some construction workers scambles
as you walk in, to look busy.  The hall is long, and made from the
same dark grey material in the lobby.  The hall stretches down, filled
with doors on either side, all the way to the end to the north.

35032.name: The Rear Halls of the Arena
description: You stand in the rear halls of the arena.  It is nothing but one
large room which continues west and east.  A few doors lead outside,
and some into the actual arena, but this is a work area of the WBA.

35014.name: The Western Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues

35007.name: The [{RW{wB{BA{B] Ticket Master{x
description: You enter a small area off the sidewalks of the city.  A small
booth stands before you, with the ticket master inside.  The booth is
the place to get tickets for any "World Battle Arena" event, that
takes place in the Battle Gardens.  Back south is Hilp Ave.

35040.name: The Eastern Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are

35052.name: The Southeast Corner
description: You stand in the southeast corner of the arena.  To the west, is
the long hallway of offices of the WBA.  Strenching endlessly north is
the eastern locker rooms, and rear of the building.  The lobby is back
west.

35100.name: The Women's Bathroom
description: You stand in a large pink bathroom.  Stalls line the northern wall,
and sinks to the south.  The bathroom looks and smells clean.  You see
a female waitress waiting on the females in the room.

35074.name: Church Of Destruction Locker Room

35038.name: The Eastern Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.

35091.name: Behind The Battle Gardens Stadium
description: You stand outside the north end of the Battle Gardens.  Here you
see the building stretching upwards towards the sky.  All around you
is the back of the buildings that make up this side of Torregiano.  To
the north, east and west you can see shops.

35096.name: [WBA] Stairs To The Second Floor
description: You stand in a small room of the lobby.  Here a large red carpeted
staircase goes into the second floor, which happens to be the Sports
Bar.  The sounds and smell of the bar are leaking as far as down here.
You can go up if you wish.  The bathrooms are also upstairs.

35048.name: The Eastern Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.
{R<--- Church Of Celestia{x

35031.name: The Rear Halls of the Arena
description: You stand in the rear halls of the arena.  It is nothing but one
large room which continues west and east.  A few doors lead outside,
and some into the actual arena, but this is a work area of the WBA.

35053.name: The Eastern Wing [Offices]
description: You stand in the western wing.  Some construction workers scambles
as you walk in, to look busy.  The hall is long, and made from the
same dark grey material in the lobby.  The hall stretches down, filled
with doors on either side, all the way to the end to the north.

35098.name: The {x[{RW{wB{BA{x] {CS{cports {CB{car{x
description: You stand within in [{RW{wB{BA{B] {CS{cports {CB{car{x, the place to be to watch any
WBA competition.  Before you stands a huge bar, filled with round
tables covering the floor.  To the north, a large bar stocked full of
booze stands, almost glowing.  In the back there is a kitchen, where
you can get some food, and some booze.  A large Viewing Crystal has
been mounted over the bar, tuned into the arena.

35087.name: Behind The Battle Gardens Stadium
description: You stand outside the north end of the Battle Gardens.  Here you
see the building stretching upwards towards the sky.  All around you

35043.name: The Eastern Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.

35036.name: The Northeast Corner
description: You stand in the northeast corner of the arena.  Here a door to the
north has a glowing sign reading {REXIT{x on it.  To the west there is a
large open back room, the back of the arena, and a work place for
setting up the competitions.  To the south, a long endless hallway
leads south pass the Eastern Locker Rooms.

35113.name: Hilp Street Train Station
description: You stand in the Hilp Street Train Station, in Torregiano.  Hilp
Street is famous for being the best party area in the city of
Torregiano.  Many Night Clubs, Bars and even the World Battle Arena
Battle Garden is on this street.  Stairs lead up the street.  The rest
of the station stands before you, a small Torregiano Ticket Seller
stands behind a small booth, giving out tickets.

35046.name: The Eastern Locker Rooms

{R<--- The Shadow Thieves{x

35050.name: The Eastern Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are

{R<--- The Legion{x

35088.name: Behind The Battle Gardens Stadium
description: You stand outside the north end of the Battle Gardens.  Here you
see the building stretching upwards towards the sky.  All around you
is the back of the buildings that make up this side of Torregiano.  To
the north, east and west you can see shops.

35008.name: The Battle Gardens Lobby [South]
description: You stand in the great lobby of the World Battle Arena Battle
Gardens.  The whole room is covered in a large red rug, the walls a
dark gray.  Pictures hang on the walls, ones of diffrent battles.
Some gas lights are mounted to the sides of the wall, giving off a
very office type look, but dark and warm feeling.  The lobby ceiling
stretches up into an arch, and you can see the offices of the building
reach up towards the sky by 5 stories.  The cannon control track looms
overhead though.  The lobby continues north, or the office wings are
to either side of you.

35105.name: {GF{gloor {R5{B [ {CAIR{7SHIP {RINCO{rRPER{RATED {B]{x
description: You stand on the fifth floor of the WBA Battle Gardens.  Before you
stands many control panels, all used to control the Battle Gardens.  A
large window faces north, overlooking the whole arena, which takes up
one corner of Torregiano.  Several people sit turning knobs and
watching the window.

35009.name: The Battle Gardens Lobby [North]
description: You stand in the great lobby of the World Battle Arena Battle
Gardens.  The whole room is covered in a large red rug, the walls a
dark gray.  Pictures hang on the walls, ones of diffrent battles.
Some gas lights are mounted to the sides of the wall, giving off a
very office type look, but dark and warm feeling.  The lobby ceiling
stretches up into an arch, and you can see the offices of the building
reach up towards the sky by 5 stories.  The cannon control track looms
overhead though.  The lobby continues north, or the office wings are
to either side of you.  To great big doors stand to the north, wood
and iron, made to keep all that is behind it, there.  These doors lead
into the actual arena.  There are bathrooms on either side of you.

35024.name: The Western Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.
{RElven Alliance --->{x

35020.name: The Western Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are

{RChurch of Strife --->{x

35051.name: The Eastern Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.

35089.name: Behind The Battle Gardens Stadium
description: You stand before the great doors of the Arena.  This is the path
where large things are moved in and out of the arena.  You are
standing outside the arena on its northern end.  You also stand behind
all the buildings this side of Torregiano.  The back lot continues
east and west.

35000.name: The {RW{rorld {wB{&attle {BA{brena {GGa{grde{Gns{x
description: You stand before a huge arena, that is taking up most of the
northeast side of the city.  The walls stand tall, and it overshadows
most of the buildings, except for the cannon, which its control track
swings over the top of the arena.  From here you can see a path
leading north, into a pair of gates, and off to the lobby of the
arena.  Back south is Hilp Ave.

35101.name: The Men's Bathroom
description: You walk into the mens bathroom.  Here to the north is a short line
of stalls.  To the northeast is a large line of urinals, waiting for
the men.  The bathroom looks clean, but not to much comment can be
made by the smell.

35076.name: Elven Alliance Locker Room

large room which continues west and east.  A few doors lead outside,
and some into the actual arena, but this is a work area of the WBA.

35003.name: The Western Entrance
description: You stand at the Western Entrance.  To the east you see the doors
to the grand lobby of the arena, and the line from the eastern gate.
Some security guards walk around here, waiting for problems, or just
to watch the crowd.

35094.name: A alley behind the Battle Gardens
description: You stand in a small alley behind the buildings of Westbridge Ave.
The alley extends south, where you see a large iron gate, and the
great WBA Battle Gardens.  A guard stands here, watching you.

35029.name: The Western Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.

35055.name: The Eastern Wing [Offices]
description: You stand in the western wing.  Some construction workers scambles
as you walk in, to look busy.  The hall is long, and made from the
same dark grey material in the lobby.  The hall stretches down, filled
with doors on either side, all the way to the end to the north.

35104.name: {GF{gloor {R4{B [ {RT{rri{BP{bower {YA{yirship {YA{yuthority {B]{x
description: You begin to walk up the rough iron spiral staircase that goes up
into the insides of the Battle Gardens.  As you enter the fourth
floor, you are surrounded by desks, a vast room filled with them.  The
stairwell continues up and down.

35092.name: A alley behind the Battle Gardens
description: You stand in a small alley behind the buildings of Westbridge Ave.
The alley extends south, where you see a large iron gate, and the
great WBA Battle Gardens.  A guard stands here, watching you.

35022.name: The Western Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.
{RDragon's Hoard --->{x

35001.name: The {RW{rorld {wB{&attle {BA{brena {GGa{grde{Gns{x
description: You stand before a huge arena, that is taking up most of the
northeast side of the city.  The walls stand tall, and it overshadows
most of the buildings, except for the cannon, which its control track
swings over the top of the arena.  From here you can see a path
leading north, into a pair of gates, and off to the lobby of the
arena.  Back south is Hilp Ave.

35095.name: [WBA] Stairs To The Second Floor
description: You stand in a small room of the lobby.  Here a large red carpeted
staircase goes into the second floor, which happens to be the Sports
Bar.  The sounds and smell of the bar are leaking as far as down here.
You can go up if you wish.  The bathrooms are also upstairs.

35039.name: The Eastern Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.

35103.name: {GF{gloor {R3{B [ {xTHE {RW{rORLD {7B{&ATTLE {BA{bRENA {B]{x
description: You begin to walk up the rough iron spiral staircase that goes up
into the insides of the Battle Gardens.  As you enter the third floor,
you are surrounded by desks, a vast room filled with them.  The
stairwell continues up and down.

35016.name: The Western Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.

35097.name: Before The Arena's Sports Bar
description: You stand before the Sports Bar of the arena, the main party place
in the whole building.  The room is filled with life and activies,
smoke pours out as everyone enjoys themselves.  Food and drink are on
the tables.  Down the stairs is the lobby of the Arena.
To the east is the "MENS BATHROOM".

35030.name: The Northwest Corner
description: You stand in the northwest corner of the arena.  Here the back of
the arena opens up into a large room, used for setting up contests and
holding press confrence.  A large door stands here, with a glowing
{REXIT{x sign on it.  The back warehouse continues east.

35057.name: The Legion's Locker Room
description: ----------------- Rules & Regulations Of Waterstock -----------------
1. Teams will be made up of 1 member of each class. [14]
2. Outside EQ will be permitted.
3. No Potions or Pills Allowed once the battle has started.
4. There will be NO LOOTING in this arena.
5. Clans who cannot create a whole team, that's your fault.
6. The arena will be logged, cheaters within clans will be disqualf.
7. Being Disqualified means your clan looses, meaning bye bye clan!
8. Corpses will be returned by the Immortal Staff.
9. Three Rounds of Attacks, Once you die, your out until next round.
10. IMP INVIS is illegal when your team is only down to 2 members.
{x
PENALTY: Breakage of the WBA Rules & Regulations will result in your
clan getting destroyed (WIPED), your own characters destroyed (WIPED,
and a full site block on your ISP (Full Ban). The WBA event will be
>>> FULLY LOGGED AND REVIEWED <<<
--------- DO NOT ENTER THE ARENA UNTIL THE CANNON IS FIRED! ---------
-- Entering The Arena Before The Start Is Instant Disqualification! -

35026.name: The Western Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.
{RChurch Of Destruction --->{x

35025.name: The Western Locker Rooms
description: You are walking down an endless corridor of doors, and locker
rooms.  It is somewhat hot back here, as the construction workers are
still building the rooms, to house each clans.  The Hallway continues
endlessly north and south.

35120.name: The W.B.A. Waterstock Healer~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
35120.room_name: A {RW.{7B.{BA.{x Healer stands here, helping you clan out.

35114.name: The Railway Ticket Collector~
35114.room_name: The Railway Collector stands here, collecting your ticket.

35113.name: The Ticket Seller~
35113.room_name: A Torregiano Rail Ticket seller stands here.

35000.name: The Security Guard~
35000.room_name: A [{RW{wB{BA{x] Battle Garden Arena Security Guard stands here on duty.

35001.name: A Security Guard~
35001.room_name: A [{RW{wB{BA{x] Battle Garden Arena Security Guard stands here on duty.

35002.name: The WBA Sports Bartender~
35002.room_name: The WBA Sports Bartender stands behind his bar, on duty.

35003.name: The WBA Sports Bar Waitress~
35003.room_name: The WBA Sports Bar Waitress stands here giving out drinks.

35004.name: A Secuirty Guard~
subroutines:

F vul C
35004.room_name: A [{RW{wB{BA{x] Battle Gardens Security Guard stands here.

35005.room_name: A [{RW{wB{BA{x] Arena Janitor stands here with his broom.
